chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
It's supposed to arrive tomorrow and it still hasn't been shipped.
Thanks,

Hello 

We wanted to let you know Jimena hasn’t received their order.

The tracking link doesn't work, so we’re unable to check the package's location.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?

In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

If you've shipped the order but it's lost, we will gather the paperwork from the customer and forward it to you. We'll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,
Andres, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been shipped and is currently on the way to the customer. You can check the progress of the delivery through this tracking link https://www.ups.com/track?loc=es_es&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901183485/trackdetails

Regards,
CH
